name: TicTacToe++
description:
A simple clone of Connect-Four. Honestly, I'm not going after any sort of payment for this whatsoever. It's intended to go on my website, which I'm using to showcase some projects as a portfolio. This project in particular is being used to demonstrate my mastery over multi-dimensional arrays and nested loops to elegantly control them.

No ads on my site, so I'm still not monetizing this is any way whatsoever. Please don't sue me, I'm just trying to get a job in software.
